00019 #ifndef TLM_UTILS_CONVENIENCE_SOCKET_BASES_H_INCLUDED_
00020 #define TLM_UTILS_CONVENIENCE_SOCKET_BASES_H_INCLUDED_
00021 
00022 #include <sysc/kernel/sc_cmnhdr.h>
00023 
00024 namespace sc_core { class SC_API sc_object; }
00025 
00026 namespace tlm_utils {
00027 
00028 // implementation-defined base class helper for convenience sockets
00029 class SC_API convenience_socket_base
00030 {
00031 public:
00032   void display_warning(const char* msg) const;
00033   void display_error(const char* msg) const;
00034 protected:
00035   virtual ~convenience_socket_base(){}
00036 private:
00037   virtual const char* get_report_type() const = 0;
00038   virtual const sc_core::sc_object* get_socket() const = 0;
00039 };
00040 
00041 // implementation-defined base class helper for simple sockets
00042 class SC_API simple_socket_base : public convenience_socket_base
00043 {
00044   virtual const char* get_report_type() const;
00045 protected:
00046   void elaboration_check(const char* action) const;
00047 };
00048 
00049 // implementation-defined base class helper for passthrough sockets
00050 class SC_API passthrough_socket_base : public convenience_socket_base
00051 {
00052   virtual const char* get_report_type() const;
00053 };
00054 
00055 // implementation-defined base class helper for multi sockets
00056 class SC_API multi_socket_base : public convenience_socket_base
00057 {
00058   virtual const char* get_report_type() const;
00059 };
00060 
00061 // implementation-defined base class for callback helpers
00062 class SC_API convenience_socket_cb_holder
00063 {
00064 public:
00065   void display_warning(const char* msg) const;
00066   void display_error(const char* msg) const;
00067 
00068 protected:
00069   explicit convenience_socket_cb_holder(convenience_socket_base* owner)
00070     : m_owner(owner) {}
00071 
00072 private:
00073   convenience_socket_base* m_owner;
00074 };
00075 
00076 } // namespace tlm_utils
00077 #endif // TLM_UTILS_CONVENIENCE_SOCKET_BASES_H_INCLUDED_
